events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Software Engineering roles based on your experience with development and devops.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be reaching out to coordinate the next steps.
We completed an initial screening call, discussing your background and technical skills relevant to our engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt response after the screening; you confirmed your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 20th at 10 AM UTC to assess your software development skills.
The technical interview was successfully completed; you demonstrated strong knowledge in coding and system design.
We have arranged your HR interview for June 23rd in order to discuss company culture and benefits in detail.
The HR interview went smoothly, confirming a mutual fit between your career goals and our company values.
We have formally proposed an employment offer outlining salary, benefits, and start date for your review.
You provided positive feedback on the offer terms and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Your acceptance of the offer has been received; welcome to the team! We look forward to your contributions.
Your onboarding process has begun, including necessary training and equipment setup to ensure a smooth start.
The recruitment cycle is now closed with your successful hire; we are excited to have you officially on board.
